category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_Own_MDS_part_object_name
preference.preference_description: Defines the object class name used by the "imds_download_process_files" utility to search for the own International Material Data System (IMDS) objects in Teamcenter. The default value is ItemRevision.
